ðŸ“– Summary: Feeder is an open-source Android feed reader that allows users to read news and posts from their favorite sites. It supports RSS, Atom, and JSONFeed formats and operates locally on the device, ensuring data privacy. Key features include offline reading, notification support, OPML import/export, and a Material Design interface.
